'''Mahmoud Abdel Razek Fadlallah''', better known as '''Shikabala''' ({{lang-ar|ÙØ­ÙÙØ¯ Ø¹Ø¨Ø¯Ø§ÙØ±Ø§Ø²Ù "Ø´ÙÙØ§Ø¨Ø§ÙØ§"}}) (born 5 March 1986 in [[Aswan]], [[Egypt]]), is an [[Egypt]]ian [[Football (soccer)|footballer]] who currently plays for [[Egyptian Premier League]] club [[Zamalek]] <ref>[http://www.footmercato.net/Mahmoud-Abdel-Razak-6430_j.html Shikabala]</ref>, where he started his football career. He has previously played for [[PAOK F.C.|PAOK]] of [[Thessaloniki]].
'''Mahmoud Abdel Razek Fadlallah''', better known as '''Shikabala''' ({{lang-ar|ÙØ­ÙÙØ¯ Ø¹Ø¨Ø¯Ø§ÙØ±Ø§Ø²Ù "Ø´ÙÙØ§Ø¨Ø§ÙØ§"}}) (born 5 March 1986 in [[Aswan]], [[Egypt]]), is an [[Egypt]]ian [[Football (soccer)|footballer]] who currently plays for [[Egyptian Premier League]] club [[Zamalek]] <ref>[http://www.footmercato.net/Mahmoud-Abdel-Razak-6430_j.html Shikabala]</ref>, where he started his football career. He has previously played for [[PAOK F.C.|PAOK]] of [[Thessaloniki]].
â
Shikabala plays a free role, usually in the upper midfield, either as a [[playmaker]], a [[Midfielder#Winger|winger]], or an [[attacking midfielder]]. His pace, skills, neat passing and finishing attracted many clubs in Egypt and Europe to try and attain his services. He had a short spell in the [[Greek league]] with [[PAOK F.C.|PAOK]], however he had to return to Egypt to attend to military duties, so he chose to regather with his previous youth club Zamalek, he soon became one of the club's top stars.
+
Shikabala plays a free role, usually in the upper midfield, either as a [[playmaker]], a [[Midfielder#Winger|winger]], or an [[attacking midfielder]]. His pace, skills, neat passing and finishing attracted many clubs in Egypt and Europe to try and attain his services. He had a short spell in the [[Greek league]] with [[PAOK F.C.|PAOK]], however he had to return to Egypt to attend to [[Military service (Egypt)|military duties]], so he chose to regather with his previous youth club Zamalek, he soon became one of the club's top stars.
On July 23, 2007, Shikabala was banned from representing the Egyptian national team for one year. This decision was taken by the [[Egyptian Football Association]] (EFA) due to the player's âinappropriate behaviourâ during the [[2007 All-Africa Games]].<ref name=int-ban>[http://sports.filbalad.com/english/News.asp?NewsID=34333 Shikabala banned from representing Egypt], FilGoal</ref>
On July 23, 2007, Shikabala was banned from representing the Egyptian national team for one year. This decision was taken by the [[Egyptian Football Association]] (EFA) due to the player's âinappropriate behaviourâ during the [[2007 All-Africa Games]].<ref name=int-ban>[http://sports.filbalad.com/english/News.asp?NewsID=34333 Shikabala banned from representing Egypt], FilGoal</ref>
